front.title: Suite B Profile for Transport Layer Security (TLS)

abstract.t: The United States Government has published guidelines for "NSA Suite B Cryptography", which defines cryptographic algorithm policy for national security applications. This document defines a profile of TLS version 1.2 which is fully conformant with Suite B. This document also defines a transitional profile for use with TLS version 1.0 and TLS version 1.1 employ Suite B algorithms to the greatest extent possible.
